text: I wish your smile outlives galaxies and lights up every universe you enter
I wish every dream you carry becomes a reality brighter than you imagined
I wish you always know how deeply loved and cherished you are
I wish your laughter echoes through time, bringing joy wherever it travels
I wish you find peace in every storm and strength in every challenge
I wish your kindness comes back to you tenfold, wrapped in love
I wish every sunrise reminds you of new beginnings and endless possibilities
I wish your heart stays as gentle and beautiful as it is today
I wish you dance through life with the same grace you bring to my world
I wish that no matter where life takes us, you always feel my love beside you
